snippet: Two German diplomats survived a shooting on their car while on a visit to eastern Saudi Arabia on Monday, the state news agency SPA reported.
abstract: Two German diplomats survive an ambush while on a drive through Awamiya, in eastern Saudi Arabia.
lead_paragraph: Two German diplomats survived a shooting on their car while on a visit to eastern Saudi Arabia on Monday, the state news agency SPA reported.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: German Envoys Are Attacked
